text: Marco Vinicio Cerezo Arévalo (born December 26, 1942) is a Guatemalan politician. He was the President of Guatemala from January 14, 1986 to January 14, 1991. ==References== ==Other websites== *Biography by CIDOB (in Spanish) *Congressional web page *Crisis de Gobernabilidad 1a. Fase: Perspectiva Política, New Media, Francisco Marroquín Category:Presidents of Guatemala Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:People from Guatemala City
title: Vinicio Cerezo
